name: design-tokens
description: This repository contains an example script that uses [Style Dictionary](https://amzn.github.io/style-dictionary/) to manage design tokens. The script pulls a token set generated by syncing a Figma file with zeroheight. For more details on how to sync Figma files with zeroheight, see [this guide](https://zeroheight.com/help/article/documenting-figma-color-variables).
